 * This method is called from within the constructor to
 * initialize the form.
 * WARNING: Do NOT modify this code. The content of this method is
 * always regenerated by the Form Editor.
 */
// <editor-fold defaultstate="collapsed" desc="Generated Code">//GEN-BEGIN:initComponents
@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
private void initComponents() {
    GridBagConstraints gridBagConstraints;
    collectionsPanel = new JPanel();
    collectionsScrollPane = new JScrollPane();
    collectionList = new JList();
    collectionsLabel = new JLabel();
    familiesPanel = new JPanel();
    familiesScrollPane = new JScrollPane();
    familyList = new JList();
    familyLabel = new JLabel();
    facesPanel = new JPanel();
    facesScrollPane = new JScrollPane();
    faceList = new JList();
    faceLabel = new JLabel();
    setBorder(BorderFactory.createEmptyBorder(3, 3, 3, 3));
    setLayout(new GridBagLayout());
    collectionsPanel.setMinimumSize(new Dimension(10, 10));
    collectionsPanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(80, 200));
    collectionsPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
    collectionsScrollPane.setHorizontalScrollBarPolicy(ScrollPaneConstants.HORIZONTAL_SCROLLBAR_NEVER);
    collectionList.setFont(collectionList.getFont().deriveFont(((float) (11))));
    collectionsScrollPane.setViewportView(collectionList);
    collectionsPanel.add(collectionsScrollPane, BorderLayout.CENTER);
    collectionsLabel.setFont(collectionsLabel.getFont().deriveFont(((float) (11))));
    collectionsLabel.setText(labels.getString("FontCollection.collections"));// NOI18N

    collectionsPanel.add(collectionsLabel, BorderLayout.PAGE_START);
    gridBagConstraints = new GridBagConstraints();
    gridBagConstraints.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
    gridBagConstraints.weightx = 0.3;
    gridBagConstraints.weighty = 1.0;
    add(collectionsPanel, gridBagConstraints);
    familiesPanel.setMinimumSize(new Dimension(10, 10));
    familiesPanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100, 200));
    familiesPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
    familiesScrollPane.setHorizontalScrollBarPolicy(ScrollPaneConstants.HORIZONTAL_SCROLLBAR_NEVER);
    familiesScrollPane.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(130, 240));
    familyList.setFont(familyList.getFont().deriveFont(((float) (11))));
    familiesScrollPane.setViewportView(familyList);
    familiesPanel.add(familiesScrollPane, BorderLayout.CENTER);
    familyLabel.setFont(familyLabel.getFont().deriveFont(((float) (11))));
    familyLabel.setText(labels.getString("FontCollection.family"));// NOI18N

    familiesPanel.add(familyLabel, BorderLayout.PAGE_START);
    gridBagConstraints = new GridBagConstraints();
    gridBagConstraints.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
    gridBagConstraints.weightx = 0.4;
    gridBagConstraints.weighty = 1.0;
    gridBagConstraints.insets = new Insets(0, 3, 0, 0);
    add(familiesPanel, gridBagConstraints);
    facesPanel.setMinimumSize(new Dimension(10, 10));
    facesPanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(80, 200));
    facesPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
    facesScrollPane.setHorizontalScrollBarPolicy(ScrollPaneConstants.HORIZONTAL_SCROLLBAR_NEVER);
    facesScrollPane.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(130, 240));
    faceList.setFont(faceList.getFont().deriveFont(((float) (11))));
    facesScrollPane.setViewportView(faceList);
    facesPanel.add(facesScrollPane, BorderLayout.CENTER);
    faceLabel.setFont(faceLabel.getFont().deriveFont(((float) (11))));
    faceLabel.setText(labels.getString("FontCollection.typeface"));// NOI18N

    facesPanel.add(faceLabel, BorderLayout.PAGE_START);
    gridBagConstraints = new GridBagConstraints();
    gridBagConstraints.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
    gridBagConstraints.weightx = 0.3;
    gridBagConstraints.weighty = 1.0;
    gridBagConstraints.insets = new Insets(0, 3, 0, 0);
    add(facesPanel, gridBagConstraints);
}// </editor-fold>//GEN-END:initComponents
